modName: Defined Bodies and Faces - Wrinkles Optional
summary:
Subtle skin and face enhancements on all races.
-Smooths blocky faces and bodies. -Option to smooth out wrinkles.
-Enhances definition. -Option to replace elf textures with \'smoother\' ones.
descriptionHtml:
Latest update: 12/02/2011 - v09 (0.9)

NOTE: I DID NOT just blur out the textures. As one could tell, the subtle texture details still exist. My goal was NOT to make blurry skin and call it flawless. Feel free to check out the files yourself.

This all-in-one texture modification successfully, yet subtly, enhances the in-game character appearance for all male and female races.

-Smooths blocky faces and bodies.
-Enhances definition.

Add-ons:
-Smoother Faces
-Replace Bethesda\'s elf textures - with less forehead definition. (Coming Soon)
-Cleaned and Defined Skin (Less Hair and Dirt) (Coming Soon)

This modification is compatible with most other mods, as long as you install mine first.
Repeat: Install THIS mod FIRST, then install other mods for desired effects.

Install:
	Drop the data folder in the common\\skyrim directory
or
	Drop the texture folder in the Skyrim\\Data directory


Default Install Directory:

	\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

x86 (32 bit):
	C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

x64 (64 bit):
	C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
author: shinobi904

files.name: Defined Skins and Faces v05
files.changelogHtml:
Returned normalmaps back to original resolution, with 0 quality loss.
Blurred out all blockyness, then restored definintion through normalmap preservation and specular maps.
Include updated argonian and khajiit normalmaps. (Still needs significant amount of cleaning)

files.name: Defined Bodies and Faces
files.changelogHtml:
Increased detail in all races
Cleaned up Argonian light effect
Enhanced age maps
Less shiny and less oily looking textures
Cleaned up \"splotches\"
